Razorwing: They won't escape this time!

He opened a comm channel to his troops.

Razorwing: Send the Metal Wyvern to Atlantis. Prepare troops for heavy
combat in tight quarters, and equip each squads with disabling
weapons. I want them near termination, but still alive.

Jotunn, on his side, also decided to help. He called Olympus, which
was nearer to Atlantis and mobilized troops.

Jotunn: Mobilize two Governmental battalions. They have five Minions
as targets. Bring them down!

He also entered a code that mobilized his nameless second into the
fight. Things would get very interesting.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, rm2kmidi <kraftlos@g...> wrote:
> At that moment he switched on his comlink and recieved the distress
call 
> from Ravencheif and the message from Salveo.
>  "This is incredibly disturbing... Would you please excuse me for a
moment, 
> I need to make some calls. We'll debate this later. " said Perseus.
>  // A minute later outside the room
>  "This is Perseus, I am currently in Relay city.There is no way I could 
> reach you in time. I'm going to stay on the radio here and try to
get you 
> any help I can. Salveo is on his way to his location. Be smart, try
to stay 
> alive. Perseus out."
>  // Perseus re-entered the room
>  "I'm afraid I need to ask you a favor. Do you have any troops close to 
> sector Anbai? I had two of my bots escorting a child back to our
base. They 
> aparently were ambushed. They are outnumbered 5 to 2." 
>  Lord Perseus sat back in his chair.
> 
>  On 8/29/05, Airly <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> > 
> > Lady spire:
> >  "Perseus, Perseus, Perseus" sighed Lady Spire"You're so delicious 
> > charming and sweet... But if you don't join this war, the war will
go to 
> > Atlantis... or is moving to."said while she cheked something in
her comlink" 
> > 'cause, my troops are reporting me that something really big is
happening 
> > around Atlaintis and Unicronians signatures are involved.."
> > 
> > ----- Original Message ----- 
> > *From:* rm2kmidi <kraftlos@g...> 
> > *To:* nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> > *Sent:* Monday, August 29, 2005 12:32 PM
> > *Subject:* Re: Towards the Meeting, second invitation
> > 
> > Perseus smiled, "As you know, I have no interest in fighting a
war. I'm 
> > happy to be involved in the process nevertheless."
> > 
> >
